displaytitle: Design for a lunette over an arch with nude figures
medium: red chalk over traces of black chalk on beige laid paper, squared in red chalk, edge mounted to beige laid paper.
creditline: Museum purchase, Laura P. Hall Memorial Fund
markings:
Lily over three mountains within
double circle (similar to Briquet 11935, Rome 1554)
inscribed: Inscribed recto, lower left, in graphite: 308.1

titles.title: Design for a lunette over an arch with nude figures

texts.textentryhtml: Dr. Ludwig Pollak, stamp (L. 788b) recto, lower right, in black; Wolfhart Bürgi, Berne, stamp (L. 3400) recto, lower right, in red; H. Shickman Gallery, New York; Bought from Shickman Galleries, New York.  Their inventory number D1117;

bibliography.boilertext: Larry J. Feinberg, From studio to studiolo: Florentine draftsmanship under the first Medici grand dukes, (Oberlin, OH: Allen Memorial Art Museum, Oberlin College; Seattle, WA: Distributed by University of Washington Press, 1991).
bibliography.citation: Larry J. Feinberg, From studio to studiolo: Florentine draftsmanship under the first Medici grand dukes, (Oberlin, OH: Allen Memorial Art Museum, Oberlin College; Seattle, WA: Distributed by University of Washington Press, 1991)., p 144-145, cat. no. 35; p. 145 (illus.)

bibliography.boilertext: "Acquisitions 1970", Record of the Art Museum, Princeton University 30, no. 1 (1971): p. 22-30.
bibliography.citation: "Acquisitions 1970", Record of the Art Museum, Princeton University 30, no. 1 (1971): p. 22-30., p. 27

bibliography.boilertext: Stefania Vasetti, Bernardino Poccetti e gli Strozzi: committenze a Firenze nel primo decennio del Seicento, (Firenze: Opus libri, 1994).
bibliography.citation: Stefania Vasetti, Bernardino Poccetti e gli Strozzi: committenze a Firenze nel primo decennio del Seicento, (Firenze: Opus libri, 1994)., p. 21; p. 55, no. 9 (illus.)

bibliography.boilertext: Felton Gibbons, Catalogue of Italian Drawings in The Art Museum, Princeton University, (Princeton, NJ: Princeton University Press, 1977).
bibliography.citation: Felton Gibbons, Catalogue of Italian Drawings in The Art Museum, Princeton University, (Princeton, NJ: Princeton University Press, 1977)., Vol. 1: pp. 160-161, no. 500 (illustrated in Vol. 2 under the same catalog number)

bibliography.boilertext: Laura Giles, Lia Markey, Claire Van Cleave, et. al., Italian Master Drawings from the Princeton University Art Museum, (Princeton, NJ: Princeton University Art Museum, 2014).
bibliography.citation: Laura Giles, Lia Markey, Claire Van Cleave, et. al., Italian Master Drawings from the Princeton University Art Museum, (Princeton, NJ: Princeton University Art Museum, 2014)., p. 114, cat. no. 46; p. 115 (illus.)
